mapper.select: select id ,status ,detail ,name from seats where id = #{value}

select A.id "screen.id" ,A.seats_count "screen.seatsCount" ,A.NAME "screen.name" ,B.id id ,B.status status ,B.detail detail ,B.name name from screens A, seats B where A.id = B.screen_id and A.id = #{value} order by B.id

select C.id "movieTimetable.id" ,C.started_at "movieTimetable.statedAt" ,C.ended_at "movieTimetable.endedAt" ,C.ordered "movieTimetable.ordered" ,D.id id ,D.seat_id "seat.id" ,E.name "seat.name" from movie_timetable C, tickets D, seats E where C.id = D.movie_timetable_id and E.id = D.seat_id and C.id = #{value}
